email_response.subject: Re: OPPORTUNITY: Satellite Upgrade technicians needed in Chicago
email_response.body:
Good morning!

I'm very interested in the satellite upgrade project you have available in Chicago.

I'm fully equipped for this type of work:
- Bucket truck: 2023 Freightliner M2 with Altec AA55E aerial device
- Spectrum analyzer: Anritsu MS2760A ultraportable
- Fiber splicer: Fujikura 90S+

I've been in the telecommunications field for 12 years with extensive satellite and antenna work experience. I'm CompTIA Network+ certified, BICSI certified, and OSHA-10 trained.

I'm happy to travel throughout the Chicago metro and Midwest region. Attached is my current insurance certificate - $2.5M general liability coverage through Travelers Insurance, valid through March 2027.

Looking forward to working with you!

David Martinez
Windy City Tech Services
(312) 555-0456
